## Terminologies
<br><br>

- Blank solvent  

- Data-dependent analysis (DDA)  

- Data-independent analysis (DIA)  

- Extracted ion chromatogram (EIC)  

- Field blanks  

- High resolution mass spectrometry (HRMS) 

- Non-target analysis (NTA)  

- Procedural blanks  

- Pseudo-quantification  

- Quality assurance (QA) sample  

- Semi-quantification  
- Solvent blank

- Suspect screening analysis (SSA)
